reg_info.act_under: Early Childhood Educators Act, 2007   Loi de 2007 sur les éducatrices et les éducateurs de la petite enfance

content.content: 1. For the purposes of the definition of “transitional period” in section 59 of the Act, the transitional period shall end on the day that is 18 months after the day the transitional Council is appointed under section 60 of the Act. O. Reg. 251/07, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of the definition of “transitional period” in section 59 of the Act, the transitional period shall end on the day that is 18 months after the day the transitional Council is appointed under section 60 of the Act. O. Reg. 251/07, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 251/07, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 251/07, s. 2.
